Q1 Where should I self-ship the Returns? 
 
 You can send the return to any one of the
 following returns processing facilities
 depending on your location. Kindly do not
 send it to on any other address as the
 package would not be acceptable then.
 
 ADDRESS 1:
 E3-309, MS Hall
 IIT Kharagpur
 
 ADDRESS 2:
 C-235, NH Hall
 IIT Kharagpur
 
 Q2 What is the average shipping time?
 
 Within 24 hours and it will be delivered to your concerned address in 2-3 working days.

 Q3 What are the available payment options?

 For the time being we have only cash on delivery as a payment option.

 Q4 How to report an issue?

 Go to the top left corner and click, you will find an option “Report Issue” where in you can report your issue with e-mail id. 

 Q5 What are the shipping charges?

 Delivery charge varies with each Seller. Most sellers provide FREE delivery in India. Some items may have a shipping cost depending on the nature of the product. 

 Q6 Does EBP deliver internationally ?

 No, we don’t deliver outside India.

 Q7 How are items packaged?

 All items are carefully packaged as to avoid any form of damage.
